metadata.name: Sunday Morning Catastrophe
metadata.description:
On a sunny Sunday morning, new donated dolls arrived at the facility. The kids are getting excited to get a new doll to play with each of them. Unfortunately, the new dolls are not enough for everyone, so they need to share and play them together. 

From all the newcomers, there is a doll called Martha. Martha is missing an eye and has a decapitated right hand, which made her such a perfect, broken doll for Kid 1543 as she loves to do role play as a doctor and patient. While Kid 1543 was busy playing with Martha, she did not realize Kid 1731 had lurked behind her back with a scissor in one hand.

Kid 1731 is angry and jealous because she doesn't get a new doll to play with her. Suddenly, Martha is getting snatched from Kid 1543 hand. Her hair was then brutally cut with Kid 1731’s scissors. 

It was supposed to be a peaceful Sunday morning for Martha in her new home, but there she is, getting stuck in the middle of a childish quarrel. Sitting in silence and helpless under all the shouting and fighting over her ugly hair and messy figure.

2022 | 3508 × 2878 | mp4  
Made with Procreate and Adobe After Effects
